original_text:
Dark Vortex
Dark Vortex è un 5 reel, 243 a 3.125 modi per vincere slot da Yggdrasil Gaming. Dirigetevi in un regno pieno di forze del male, dove potrete beneficiare della tecnologia di vincita in entrambi i modi. Tutto ruota intorno al simbolo del Vortex, che apre la funzione Vortex Reels per farvi girare il Vortex. Con più modi per vincere, si raccolgono sfere rosa e blu per vincere giri gratis extra e più selvaggi per la funzione Vortex Free Spins. Giocabile su una griglia 5×5 con 3.125 modi per vincere, le pile selvagge appaiono sulle 3 bobine intermedie per enormi vittorie. Questo gioco ti offre una vincita di 7.318 volte la tua puntata ad ogni giro gratis!
Una grafica incredibile
Il Vortice Oscuro è stato attivato dalle forze del male e sta per aprire un portale verso un regno pieno di tutte le cose oscure e miserabili! Questo mostro di un gioco è Win All Ways, quindi ha un incredibile potenziale di vincita con 3125 modi che vanno sia da sinistra che da destra. Raccogli almeno due simboli maledetti sui rulli adiacenti per aprire il vortice verso l’aldilà interdimensionale – questo aumenterà l’altezza del rullo da 3 a 5 simboli e riempirà il vortice di alte retribuzioni, wilds e Free Spins potenziamenti.
Colpendo i simboli delle reliquie maledette adiacenti al vortice, il passaggio si espanderà, e se cresce fino a coprire tutte le bobine, i Free Spins con i Wilds impilati saranno premiati! Qui tutte le caratteristiche dei Free Spins raccolte dai giri del vortice diventano attive, destinate a garantire alcune mostruose vittorie! Preparatevi quindi ad essere attirati da questi poteri primordiali e a soccombere al Vortice Oscuro.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Dark Vortex è una slot Yggdrasil Gaming con 5 rulli e tra 243 e 3.125 modi per vincere. Disponibile per giocare su tutti i dispositivi da 10p a 50 sterline a giro, si apre un portale per andare in un regno pieno di tutte le cose oscure e miserabili mentre si uniscono le forze del male in questa magnifica offerta. Con vincere in entrambi i modi paga, si raccolgono i simboli del Vortex per aprire il vortice per darvi più modi per vincere, poiché potrete beneficiare di simboli stacked wilds e stacked high pay. Vedrete anche delle sfere che migliorano la vostra esperienza di giri gratis. Potete anche acquistare il vostro modo di entrare nella funzione Vortex Free Spins!
Tenete d’occhio il simbolo del Vortex perché 2 di essi che appaiono sulle bobine adiacenti li convertiranno in bobine Vortex per darvi 3 rotazioni vortex – questo è conosciuto come la caratteristica delle bobine Vortex. Queste bobine sono 5 alte invece di 3 alte con il risultato di vincere in più modi con ogni bobina del vortice in gioco. Queste bobine Vortex contengono simboli wild impilati e simboli di alto valore impilati.
Inoltre, ogni simbolo Vortex extra adiacente vi dà una bobina Vortex extra e 2 giri Vortex extra. Questi rimangono in gioco fino a quando tutti i Vortex Spin non sono stati giocati. Più bobine Vortex sono aperte, più modi di vincere sono possibili con un massimo di 3.125 modi di vincere in totale.
Nella funzione Vortex Reels, possono apparire simboli orbitali – questi potenziano la funzione Vortex Free Spins che viene attivata prima di finire i Vortex Spins. Hai un globo rosa – ogni 1 raccolto ha aggiunto 1 wild in più alle 3 bobine centrali durante i giri liberi e atterrano solo sulle bobine 1 e 5 del Vortex. Avete anche delle sfere blu che vi danno una rotazione libera extra nella funzione Vortex Free Spins – queste appaiono sulle bobine Vortex 2, 3 e 4. Ogni volta che il Vortex si apre, vengono automaticamente assegnate 5 sfere blu. Questa è conosciuta come la funzione Orbs Collection.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se hai apprezzato l’ambientazione e la scenografia di questa Slot Machine, possiamo consigliarti di scommettere i tuoi soldi in Vikings Go To Hell, un’altra Slot prodotta dallo stesso provider di Online Gambling, ossia Yggdrasil. Stavolta ti vengono garantite solo 25 paylines, ma fortunatamente c’è una massiccia presenza di bonus!

raw_translation.response:
Dark Vortex

Dark Vortex is a 5-reel, 243 to 3,125 ways to win slot game from Yggdrasil Gaming. Immerse yourself in a kingdom full of evil forces, where you can benefit from winning technology in both ways. It all revolves around the Vortex symbol, which opens the Vortex Reels feature to spin the Vortex. With more ways to win, you collect pink and blue spheres to win extra free spins and more wilds for the Vortex Free Spins feature. Playable on a 5x5 grid with 3,125 ways to win, wild stacks appear on the 3 middle reels for huge wins. This game offers a win of 7,318 times your bet on every free spin!

Astonishing Graphics

The Dark Vortex has been activated by the forces of evil and is about to open a portal to a realm full of all things dark and miserable! This monster of a game is Win All Ways, so it has incredible winning potential with 3,125 ways that go both ways. Collect at least two cursed symbols on adjacent reels to open the vortex to the interdimensional afterlife - this will increase the reel height from 3 to 5 symbols and fill the vortex with high-paying symbols, wilds, and Free Spins enhancements.

By hitting the adjacent cursed relic symbols to the vortex, the passage will expand, and if it grows to cover all the reels, Free Spins with stacked wilds will be awarded! Here, all the features of the Free Spins collected from the vortex spins become active, destined to ensure some monstrous wins! So get ready to be lured by these primordial powers and give in to the Dark Vortex.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols

Dark Vortex is a Yggdrasil Gaming slot with 5 reels and between 243 and 3,125 ways to win. Available to play on all devices from 10p to 50 pounds per spin, a portal opens to go to a realm full of all things dark and miserable as the forces of evil unite in this magnificent offering. With win both ways pays, you collect Vortex symbols to open the vortex to give you more ways to win, as you can benefit from stacked wild and stacked high pay symbols. You’ll also see spheres that enhance your Free Spins experience. You can also buy your way into the Vortex Free Spins feature!

Keep an eye on the Vortex symbol as 2 of them appearing on adjacent reels will convert them into Vortex reels to give you 3 Vortex spins - this is known as the Vortex Reels feature. These reels are 5 high instead of 3 high with the result of winning in more ways with each vortex reel in play. These Vortex reels contain stacked wild symbols and stacked high pay symbols.

Also, each extra adjacent Vortex symbol gives you an extra Vortex reel and 2 extra Vortex spins. These remain in play until all Vortex Spins have been played. The more Vortex reels that are opened, the more ways to win are possible, with a maximum of 3,125 ways to win in total.

In the Vortex Reels feature, orbital symbols may appear - these enhance the Vortex Free Spins feature that is triggered before Vortex Spins end. You have a pink orb - every 1 collected adds 1 extra wild to the 3 middle reels during free spins and land only on reels 1 and 5 of the Vortex. You also have blue orbs that give you an extra free spin in the Vortex Free Spins feature - these appear on Vortex reels 2, 3 and 4. Every time the Vortex opens, 5 blue orbs are automatically awarded. This is known as the Orbs Collection feature.

Similar Slot Games

If you enjoyed the setting and scenery of this slot game, we recommend betting your money on Vikings Go To Hell, another slot produced by the same Online Gambling provider, Yggdrasil. This time you are guaranteed only 25 paylines, but fortunately, there is a massive presence of bonuses!

It all revolves around the Vortex symbol, which opens the Vortex Reels feature to spin the Vortex. With more ways to win, you collect pink and blue spheres to win extra free spins and more wilds for the Vortex Free Spins feature. Playable on a 5x5 grid with 3,125 ways to win, wild stacks appear on the 3 middle reels for huge wins. This game offers a win of 7,318 times your bet on every free spin!

Astonishing Graphics

The Dark Vortex has been activated by the forces of evil and is about to open a portal to a realm full of all things dark and miserable! This monster of a game is Win All Ways, so it has incredible winning potential with 3,125 ways that go both ways. Collect at least two cursed symbols on adjacent reels to open the vortex to the interdimensional afterlife - this will increase the reel height from 3 to 5 symbols and fill the vortex with high-paying symbols, wilds, and Free Spins enhancements.

By hitting the adjacent cursed relic symbols to the vortex, the passage will expand, and if it grows to cover all the reels, Free Spins with stacked wilds will be awarded! Here, all the features of the Free Spins collected from the vortex spins become active, destined to ensure some monstrous wins! So get ready to be lured by these primordial powers and give in to the Dark Vortex.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols

Dark Vortex is a Yggdrasil Gaming slot with 5 reels and between 243 and 3,125 ways to win. Available to play on all devices from 10p to 50 pounds per spin, a portal opens to go to a realm full of all things dark and miserable as the forces of evil unite in this magnificent offering. With win both ways pays, you collect Vortex symbols to open the vortex to give you more ways to win, as you can benefit from stacked wild and stacked high pay symbols. You’ll also see spheres that enhance your Free Spins experience. You can also buy your way into the Vortex Free Spins feature!

Keep an eye on the Vortex symbol as 2 of them appearing on adjacent reels will convert them into Vortex reels to give you 3 Vortex spins - this is known as the Vortex Reels feature. These reels are 5 high instead of 3 high with the result of winning in more ways with each vortex reel in play. These Vortex reels contain stacked wild symbols and stacked high pay symbols.

Also, each extra adjacent Vortex symbol gives you an extra Vortex reel and 2 extra Vortex spins. These remain in play until all Vortex Spins have been played. The more Vortex reels that are opened, the more ways to win are possible, with a maximum of 3,125 ways to win in total.

In the Vortex Reels feature, orbital symbols may appear - these enhance the Vortex Free Spins feature that is triggered before Vortex Spins end. You have a pink orb - every 1 collected adds 1 extra wild to the 3 middle reels during free spins and land only on reels 1 and 5 of the Vortex. You also have blue orbs that give you an extra free spin in the Vortex Free Spins feature - these appear on Vortex reels 2, 3 and 4. Every time the Vortex opens, 5 blue orbs are automatically awarded. This is known as the Orbs Collection feature.

Similar Slot Games

If you enjoyed the setting and scenery of this slot game, we recommend betting your money on Vikings Go To Hell, another slot produced by the same Online Gambling provider, Yggdrasil. This time you are guaranteed only 25 paylines, but fortunately, there is a massive presence of bonuses!
